OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive BMS-247550 IV 3 hour day 1 . Treatment continue every 3 week 4-18 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive 4 additional course beyond CR . Responding patient may receive additional course investigator 's discretion . Patients follow every 3 month .
